page.title: 18HOME LIFE_11 YEAR OLD GIRL
page.content: 7.25am my radio alarm clock goes off I open my eyes and slowly wake up. 7.30am I kick my quilt off and get up,then I put my dressing gown on. I go to the toilet and go downstairs and open the curtains and go into the kitchen, say hello to my dog and get what I can out of the fridge to eat. Then I let my dog out and turn the TV on and sit down to eat my breakfast.I watch TV until about 8.30am,when I start to get bored by the programme.I ring my friend to see if she's play- ing and then go upstairs to get dressed. I open my wardrobe and decide what I want to wear and then I get washed and dressed to take my dog for a walk and meet Angela.We go back to my house.When it is sunny we play in my paddling pool for an hour then we get some lunch,just a snack. .
